title: I can't receive short code message
content:
I cant receive verification code from any institute requires 2-step verification code to access. I can receive text message from my friend and family though. I have talked to my carrier (Verizon), and they send me a work through test message, however, any message contains CODE doesn't work.

I read articles here, someone mentions to turn the turn on premium SMS access, however, in the setting of my pixel 5 shows no installed apps have requested Premium SMS access. It is a dead-end, not even an option to choose turn-on anything.


what should I do to fix this issue??
